column4: Anyone know why I would have system sounds, but nothing comes out when I insert a music cd and it starts to play?
That is impossible....this is a macintosh..not a PC
It is generally understood that when one refers to "PC" that is is intel i386 architecture..
k3b, assuming you don't mind qt.
so it will run without needing a bunch of KDE libs?
Ok...synaptic should add the dependencies no?
Great...took me a couple days...finally figured out my prob with the firewire drive only mounting read-only....
There is a Sun binary..but it is packaged for i386..so it bombs...
Yes I doubt there are any Mac binaries for Linux. There maybe for Mac OS X.
I've never used xvidtune, xrandr is real easy to use.
